title: "Advocado Partners HUAWEI CLOUD And 4Paradigm AI To Roll Out First-of-its-Kind AI Enabled CRM For SMEs Across SEA"
excerpt: "Global ICT provider HUAWEI, AI unicorn 4Paradigm and Singapore -based startup Advocado today announced a landmark partnership to launch a first-of-its-kind AI-enabled CRM solution. By integrating 4Paradigm's Artificial Intelligence (AI) technology and HUAWEI CLOUD capabilities into Advocado's existing CRM software,"
